A(00) == 10
T(11) == 01
G(10) == 00
C(01) == 11

ssh moyerej@respublica-an01.research.chop.edu

./biscuit align -k 10 in.fa in.fastq
./biscuit align -v 8 -k 5 -1 TAGGATCTGAGTGCCCTTTTTTTACGTTCTTTAAATTATCTGTATGTGGCTTTTTTTT in.fa
